titles.title: A resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that quorum calls are charged against an individual's time under cloture.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S643-645)
Referred to the Committee on Rules.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends rule XXII of the Standing Rules of the Senate to charge the time consumed by quorum calls to the Senator who requested the call of the quorum under cloture.
